#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `lightspeed` class:

* [`package_name`](#-lightspeed--package_name)

##### <a name="-lightspeed--package_name"></a>`package_name`

Data type: `String[1]`

The name of the package to install.

Default value: `'command-line-assistant'`

##### <a name="-lightspeed--package_state"></a>`package_state`

Data type: `Enum['installed', 'present', 'absent']`

The installation state of $package_name.

Default value: `'installed'`

##### <a name="-lightspeed--service_name"></a>`service_name`

Data type: `String[1]`

The name of the Lightspeed service daemon.

Default value: `'clad'`

##### <a name="-lightspeed--service_enable"></a>`service_enable`

Data type: `Boolean`

The state of the Lightspeed service clad.

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-lightspeed--service_ensure"></a>`service_ensure`

Data type: `Stdlib::Ensure::Service`

The state of the Lightspeed service clad.

Default value: `'running'`

##### <a name="-lightspeed--backend_endpoint"></a>`backend_endpoint`

Data type: `Stdlib::HTTPUrl`

The URL to the AI Endpoint Server.

Default value: `'https://satellite.redhat.com/api/lightspeed/v1'`

##### <a name="-lightspeed--logging_level"></a>`logging_level`

Data type: `Enum['INFO', 'DEBUG']`

The logging level.

Default value: `'INFO'`
